name: GRIMO
description:
Grimo is story driven stealth action in pixel art.
Cyberchurch, neural implants, advanced robots and augmented humans all of these are common things in Grimo's world.
It’s on!

Waking up in the trunk of a moving car is a bad sign. A briefcase handcuffed to the wrist is a reliable source of trouble. And New Era Cyberchurch is zealously watching those who are overly superstitious…
Who are you? What’s going on? And what’s that bothersome noise in your head? A big hunt for a weird briefcase. And you are just an obstacle. Do you want to survive? Do you want to work it out? Action is what you need. Quick. Precise. Cool-headed.
Mechanical eyes are watching you from all sides. The iron brain is recording all your steps. Don’t make a slip.
Is your doom handcuffed to your arm a curse or an aid? It’s up to you to decide.
It’s hard to stay invisible with a briefcase in your hand, but the equipment fitted in your bracelet makes break-in considerably easier. Also, it is the most expensive shield in the history of humankind!
What game style will you choose? Sneak up in silence or crush sculls. Hack cyberheads or make holes in them! Many ways, one goal.
How can you use implants knocked out of the enemies? Or force your way feeling no pain? Or become a shadow dancer, or speak their own language with computers?
No time to feel sorry in this world. Who is a friend, who is an enemy? What’s behind their smiles?
Risk or rationale? The enemies are smart. Too smart to let you walk and get your memories easily. It will be a trip to remember. Guaranteed by the briefcase, confirmed by the Cyberchurch!
